"マイルドマイルド・マーダー・Ⅰ":
"Things will only get harder from here on.
If you value your life, ignore this request.
More powerful Darkers have appeared.
I want to conduct a large-scale cleansing
of the Darker threat. Perform this task
wherever you like.

This may be too much of an undertaking.
If you're not confident, turn back now.
※Los enemigos deben ser Nv.21+."
